remarks: Two equivalent ways of describing a compact subset of a topological space.  Inspired by Sue E. Goodman's _Beginning Topology_.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jun-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
statement:
cmpsub.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
cmpsub $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( J |`t S ) e. Comp <-> A. c e. ~P J ( S C_ U. c -> E. d e. ( ~P c i^i Fin ) S C_ U. d ) ) ) $.
$d J c d $.
$d S c d $.
$d X c d $.
